channels.description: Check all the channels that will the bot will ignore and disable/enable them.
channels.usage:
- `/channels` to display all currently disabled channels
- `/channels [disable/enable] [channel]` to disable/enable channels.

color.usage:
- `/color` to view your color and all available colors
- `/color [new color]` to set your color

commands.description: Check the disabled commands and enable/disable commands.
commands.usage:
- `/commands` to display all currently disabled commands
- `/commands [disable/enable] [command]` to disable/enable commands.

cooldowns.description: Check the all the custom cooldowns of a command and add new cooldowns.
cooldowns.usage:
- `/cooldowns [command]` to display all modified cooldowns for a command and update them.
- `/cooldowns [command] set [role] [cooldown]` to set the cooldown for this command to a certain value.- `/cooldowns [command] clear [role]` to use the default cooldown for this command.

help.usage:
To get help on a specific command, use `/help [command name]` (without the [ ]).
For a full list of all commands, simply use `/help`.

names.isDisabled: This command is currently disabled in this server.
names.categoriesHelp: Use `/help [category]` to get more info on a category, for example: `/help misc`

language.description: Set the language you want to get help on commands with.
language.usage:
- `/language [language]` to set a new language
- `/language` to get a list of available languages.

permissions.description: Set your own custom permissions that your users need to run this command in your server.
permissions.usage: - `/permissions [command]` to display and change the permissions someone needs to use this command.

prefix.description: Set a new prefix for your server.
